reviewText: I'm glad I got the DVD with this set. Being able to see the posture, breathing techniques, exercises, etc. really helped when using the audio CD later. Also fun to sing along with real kids you can see! My children went through both DVDs and CD, then moved on to other Chris Beatty CDs. I was glad they got to see Chris and Carol on the DVD before doing CDs; it makes the lessons more personal. The DVD also has graphics and upbeat, fun visuals to go with the lessons.
